&#46027;&#48372;&#44592; &#50500;&#51060;&#53080;&#51012; &#53364;&#47533;&#54616;&#47732; &#46321;&#47197; &#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#48372;&#44144;&#45208; &#54200;&#51665;&#54616;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; &#50676; &#49688; &#51080;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796;.
<br/>
Pressing the bed will return to the registration for view/edit
<br/>
Pressing the open door with arrow will go to the invoice
